alert.note: Alert for Socorro (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 18 at 3:19PM MDT until September 18 at 4:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Socorro County in central New Mexico... * Until 400 PM MDT. * At 319 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Escondida, or near Socorro, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Socorro, Lemitar, Escondida, and Luis Lopez. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 between Mile Markers 145 and 158. Highway 60 between Mile Markers 135 and 138. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
